product_name: Big Agnes Ripple Creek UL 2+ mtnGLO Tent
long_description: With built-in LED lights and a partial single-wall, 2-door design, this ultralight 2-person, 3-season backpacking tent lights up the night and lightens your load for a brilliant wilderness experience.
short_description: With built-in LED lights and a partial single-wall, 2-door design, this ultralight 2-person, 3-season backpacking tent lights up the night and lightens your load for a brilliant wilderness experience.
